movies.title: Hamnet
movies.review: Had been very excited to see this after reading the book but I sort of think that was my downfall? Was a 5/5 book for me but the movie felt like we were racing from scene to scene and skipping so much of the beautiful story along the way. I donâ€™t feel like we ever really had the chance to sit and soak in any particular part of the storyline. Still enjoyed it, but the book reigns supreme.
